Name: Double Statue of an Official and His Wife
Description: Ini and his wife Shentimentet are seated on a chair decorated with hieroglyphic text with their names and titles as well as wishes for offerings in the netherworld. Their daughter stands between their legs. They are fully dressed in long, white garments and heavy black wigs. The woman shows her affection for her husband by embracing him with one arm around his back and by touching his left arm in front.
